briefdescription.para: Creates a new ChainDescriptor object from serialized data.
Gets a ChainDescriptor from another object. Use this to avoid casts.

parameterdescription.para: The object to obtain the ChainDescriptor from.

simplesect.para: true on success, false on failure.

briefdescription.para: Initializes a ChainDescriptor object from serialized data.

simplesect.para: true on success, false on failure.

briefdescription.para: Adds a hash to the ChainDescriptor onto the end.

simplesect.para: true if the hash was added successfully, false on error.

briefdescription.para: Deserializes a ChainDescriptor so that it can be used as an object.

simplesect.para: The length read on success, 0 on failure.

briefdescription.para: Serializes a ChainDescriptor to the byte data.

simplesect.para: The length written on success, 0 on failure.

briefdescription.para: Takes a hash for the ChainDescriptor and puts it on the end. The hash is not retained so the calling function is releasing control.

simplesect.para: true if the hash was taken successfully, false on error.
